name: CandleLight (itch) (Paul.Ly)
description:
You are a little candle going on a big adventure through the dark. But be careful and pay attention to where you are heading... Can you make it to the finish before you melt away?

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/candle-light

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controller: Move with the left stick and jump with A

Keyboard: Move with WASD and jump with Space

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Game made by:

Mathis Bressaud

Paul Lyaudet

Charlie Morel

Special thanks to Romain Flas and Morgane Paviot for playtests !
